title: Portable Backup and Recovery Software DC 2016.07.31
description:
** About this release

This collection includes the latest versions of the best backup and recovery solutions for Windows.
All applications were virtualized using the latest version of VMWare Thinapp, which ensures they run on any Windows version (tested on Windows 10 64-bit).
These home-brewed VMWare USB versions do not write files nor registry entries to the host computer.
Instead, they deploy all necessary data to a subfolder along the executable.
Applications are registered and/or patched, you will be able to run them from any location (folder, USB drive).
Some applications are system specific (x86/x64), some will run on both systems.
Automatic updates and internet connections were disabled whenever such options are made available in the program's option (disallow internet access if necessary).
All files were scanned with ESET Smart Security (updated 2016.07.31)
Size (unpacked): 760 MB

** Included in this release

7-Data Recovery Suite Enterprise 3.7
Active@ File Recovery Professional 15.0.7
Active@ Partition Recovery 15.0.0
Active@ Undelete Professional 11.0.11.0
Amigabit Data Recovery Enterprise 2.0.7.0
Do Your Data Recovery 5.0.0 Technician Edition
EaseUS Data Recovery Wizard 10.2.0 Technician
FileRestorePlus 3.0.6.1019
HD Clone 6.0.5.0 Enterprise Edition (Miray Software - natively portable))
iCare Data Recovery Pro 7.9.0.0
IsoBuster Pro 3.8 Build 3.8.0.0
OfficeFIX Professional 6.115 (Cimaware)
R-Drive Image 6.0 build 6012 Technician Edition
R-Studio 8.0 Build 164571 Network Edition
R-Undelete 5.0
TogetherShare Data Recovery Professional 6.1.0
UFS Explorer Professional Recovery 5.20
Wise Data Recovery 3.84
ZAR (Zero Assumption Recovery) 10.0.444 Technician Edition
